Strings.String: Administrator permissions are required to install Microsoft Lync 2010 SDK Runtime. Contact your administrator.
Installation of Microsoft Lync 2010 SDK Runtime requires Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5. Contact your application vendor.
Due to an error with Windows Installer, the installation of Microsoft Lync 2010 SDK Runtime cannot proceed.
Another instance of setup is already running. The running instance must complete before this setup can proceed.
A beta version of Microsoft Lync 2010 SDK Runtime was detected on the computer. Uninstall any previous beta versions of Microsoft Lync 2010 SDK Runtime before continuing.
A failure occurred attempting to install Microsoft Lync 2010 SDK Runtime.
